tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We have consulted  Dr. Harish for my father. He is the most friendly doctor. He understand the patients problem with lots of patience and diagnose the reason properly in order to treat with right medication. 

He also explains very clearly the  implications of disease and next course of action to patients, it helps patients how to handle and take care in future. 

He is open to discuss and most reachable and attention to understands patients problem is commendable. Strongly recommend this doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
He explains about the issue in detail which helps the person to relax knowing the right cause and he has been always kind, genuine.

My sister had cough for more than a week and doctor advised to take few tablets and antibiotics. 

My sister is feeling good now. Thank you doctor!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Had tested positive for covid and doctor responded quickly and explained very accurately about do's and don't during covid and prescribed medication and the symptoms slown down within three days of medication course and it worked perfectly well and doctor was always available if I had any problems which I had  to share with doctor about my health issues during covid and I really want to thank doctor Harish for helping me during my tough times during covid thank you sir

Thank you doctor
